ComicInfo.Summary:
Fire from Heaven: Chapter 13. Guest-starring Stormwatch, Team 7, Gen 13, and Union. Story by Alan Moore. Art by Travis Charest and Ryan Benjamin. Savant and Tao are up to their ears in super-villains back in New York. Meanwhile, the heroes of the Wildstorm Universe unite for the ultimate battle. Plus, the return of a fallen hero from the past.
Story continues from StormWatch 36.
Story continues in Sigma #3.
ComicInfo.Title: Fire From Heaven
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "WildC.A.T.s: Covert Action Teams" Gang War,Fire from Heaven
